report_metadata.report_type: NHS Data Analytics - Comprehensive Data Integrity Assessment
report_metadata.assessment_scope: Source data verification, database migration integrity, business logic validation

key_findings: Source data quality concerns identified (50.0% tests passed)
Database migration completed with high fidelity

quality_summary: Data quality is suitable for production dashboard deployment

risk_analysis.risk_recommendation: High-risk issues must be resolved before production deployment

identified_risks.impact: Inaccurate dashboard reporting, incorrect clinical decision support
identified_risks.mitigation: Address all critical issues before production deployment
Complete migration of all trust data

identified_risks.impact: Incorrect performance metrics and trend analysis
identified_risks.mitigation: Review and fix data transformation algorithms

identified_risks.impact: May indicate data quality issues or system-wide performance problems
identified_risks.mitigation: Validate A&E data collection and processing procedures

strategic_recommendations.recommendation: Complete migration of 67 missing NHS trusts to ensure comprehensive national coverage
Implement comprehensive data validation rules in transformation pipeline to ensure mathematical consistency

action_items.description: Resolve 2 critical issues identified across all test phases
Migrate remaining 67 NHS trusts and missing time periods
action_items.success_criteria: 100% trust and period coverage in database

action_items.description: Fix calculation errors and implement validation rules
Set up automated data quality checks and alerting
Re-run complete test suite after fixes are implemented
action_items.success_criteria: All test phases pass with <5% warning rate

test_methodology.phase1_methodology: Source data verification using file system validation and CSV parsing
test_methodology.phase2_methodology: Database integrity testing using Supabase API and statistical sampling
test_methodology.phase3_methodology: Business logic validation using NHS performance standards and mathematical verification

data_sources: Raw NHS England data files (A&E, RTT, Diagnostics)

key_fields.rtt_data: JSONB field containing RTT performance metrics
key_fields.ae_data: JSONB field containing A&E performance metrics
